FileSystemHandleRequestPermission.summary:
The requestPermission() method of the
interface requests read or readwrite permissions for the
file handle.

remarks.para:
-File System API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

FileSystemHandleRequestPermission.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with which is one of 'granted', 'denied' or 'prompt'. It may also reject with one of the exceptions below.
